plot: A prime time Light Entertainment game show with comedy sketches for English education. Hosted by Munmun, contestants take on challenges. Also, 'Kamal's World' with reluctant student Kamal and his English teacher Alex.
plot_en: A prime time Light Entertainment game show with comedy sketches for English education. Hosted by Munmun, contestants take on challenges. Also, 'Kamal's World' with reluctant student Kamal and his English teacher Alex.
plot_es: A prime time Light Entertainment game show with comedy sketches for English education. Hosted by Munmun, contestants take on challenges. Also, 'Kamal's World' with reluctant student Kamal and his English teacher Alex.
title: BBC Janala Mojay Mojay Shekha
